name: promising

C1 Something that is promising shows signs that it is going to be successful or enjoyable: They won the award for the most promising new band of the year. "How's your new venture going?" "It's looking quite promising." It's a great restaurant but it doesn't look at all promising from the outside. Opposite
unpromising
More examplesFewer examplesThe commercial future of the company looks very promising.The project is only in the initial phase as yet, but it's looking quite promising.Her school report described her as a very promising pupil.Henman got off to a promising start with a lead of two sets to love.She is a highly promising young musician.
